testcase.name: Create a new article
testcase.system-out: Given url 'https://conduit.productionready.io/api/' ....................... passed * def tokenResponse = callonce read('../../helpers/CreateToken.feature@CreateToken') { "email": "karate@user.com", "password": "karate123"} . passed * def token = tokenResponse.authToken ..................................... passed Given header Authorization = 'Token ' + token ............................. passed Given path 'articles' ..................................................... passed And request ............................................................... passed When method Post .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response.article.title == 'Bla bla' ............................. passed
